article.Heading: Budget 2016: Jain Irrigation up 7%; govt to spend Rs 86500 cr on irrigation
article.Summary: Shares of Jain Irrigation Systems gained 7 percent intraday Monday as government is propose to spend Rs 86,500 crore on irrigation projects in five years.
article.Body:
Moneycontrol Bureau

Shares of Jain Irrigation Systems gained 7 percent intraday Monday as government is propose to spend Rs 86,500 crore on irrigation projects in five years.
